it.welcome:
, benvenuto su amaznbot.

Click -> @amaznbot e *imposta la lingua* 
    *Esempio:* _/lang it_ 

 *Lingue disponibili:*
it.clickInstruction: Fai clik qui per le istruzioni o invia /help ad @amaznbot

us.welcome:
, and welcome to amaznbot.

Click -> @amaznbot and *set your language* 
    *Example:* _/lang it_ 

 *Language:*
us.clickInstruction: Click here for instructions or send /help to @amaznbot
us.queryZeroDesc: You can search for whatever you want 'pc','camera'
